trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> This well-meaning mentor would ask for your help with unfinished business.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated areas and slay the anemone should it appear.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the anemone corpse to the well-meaning mentor.

TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_000<tab>Your travels have led you back to Slitherbough, I see. Your timing is fortuitous. Preparations for the anemone hunt are complete. If you are of a mind to join me, your aid would be most appreciated.

TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_001<tab>It was last seen in the southwestern region of Cleric. The hunt will prove difficult, however, as that is where the Children chose to build their spiders' nest.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_002<tab>Tread lightly, and do not hesitate to strike it down on sight. I only ask that you retrieve its corpse should you find it first.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You see no sign of the anemone. Perhaps you should search elsewhere.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You find the corpse of an animal, but there are no signs of a struggle. Perhaps it was killed with poison...
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_020<tab>You are returned. I hope you had better luck than I.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_022<tab><sigh> Would that there was another way, but the threat it posed to the Greatwood could not be ignored.
TEXT_LUCKZE018_03452_MENTOR03452_000_023<tab>Mark my words: this <var 1A 02 /var>will not<var 1A 01 /var> happen again.
